privacy.intro: we respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our SaaS service through our website or application
privacy.name: Full name
privacy.billing: Billing information (e.g., credit card, billing address)
privacy.thirdPartyDetail: If you sign in using a third-party service (e.g., Google or Microsoft), we may access certain profile information as permitted by your authorization.
privacy.service: Service providers and vendors (e.g., hosting providers, payment processors)
privacy.legal: Legal authorities if required by law
privacy.other: Other entities in the event of a merger
privacy.securityDesc: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data.
privacy.access: Access and update your personal information
privacy.request: Request deletion of your account and data
privacy.file: File a complaint or object to processing
privacy.contact: To exercise your rights, contact us at
privacy.manage: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.
privacy.childrenDesc: Our services are not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.
privacy.updateDesc: We may update this policy from time to time. Changes will be communicated via email or directly within the application.
privacy.contactUsDesc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
